description: Easy-fitting shirt made from lightweight cotton twill. Garment-dyed and washed. Vintage utility–inspired pockets.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 29½" back body length, an 18¼" shoulder, a 43½" chest, and a 34¾" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes 1" between sizes.
Point collar. Buttoned placket. Corozo buttons.
Long sleeves with buttoned barrel cuffs.
